exploreUrl:
<js>
/**
自定义数组 n 中的数字，加载1份或多份书单。
1到5，分别对应5大类书单。即，"所有"、"最新"、"精品"、"男频"、"女频"；
从6开始，则精选了几位书单大佬的书单集，分别是：
6、优书优选；
7、风萤月；
8、赤戟；
9、己未癸酉；
10、天落歌；
11、青山；
12、山猫；
13、厂长
**/
n=[3,8];
m1=["全部","新","精","男频","女频","优选","风萤","赤戟","己未","天落","青山","山猫","厂长"];
m2=["all","newest","essence","man","women",788682,756653,333316,888741,402302,698727,27857,560124];
u1="::/api/booklist/";
u2="?page={{page}}
";
w1="http://img.yousuu.com/api/booklists?page=1&type=";
w2="http://img.yousuu.com/api/user/";
w3="/booklistDetail?page=1";
result="";
function wy (n)<
n<6?www=w1+m2[n-1]:www=w2+m2[n-1]+w3;
tmp=java.ajax(www);
blist=JSON.parse(tmp).data.booklists.map(a=>"["+m1[n-1]+"] "+a.title.replace(/[^ 0-9a-zA-Z\u4e00-\u9fa5]/g,"")+u1+a.booklistId+u2).join("");return blist>
for (i in n)<result+=wy(n[i])>
</js>

ruleContent.content:
result=JSON.parse(result).data.comments.map(a=>"用户："+a.createrId.userName+"
评分："+a.score+" / 5"+"
时间："+a.createdAt.replace(/T.+/,"")+"
评语："+a.content.replace(/([。！？；]+[）”]?)/g,"$1\n").replace(/([0-9a-zA-Z\u4e00-\u9fa5])$/,"$1……")+"
该评价的点赞数："+a.praiseCount).join("
——
");

searchUrl:
<js> var body = {
  "sort": "default",
  "page": 1,
  "q": "{{key}}",
  "rootKind": "",
  "query": "
    query getFilterWorksList($works_ids: [ID!]) {
      worksList(worksIds: $works_ids) {
        
    
    title
    cover
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel
  
    
    url
    title
  
    
    author {
      name
      url
    }
    origAuthor {
      name
      url
    }
    translator {
      name
      url
    }
  
    
    abstract
    editorHighlight
  
    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    isNew
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
  
  
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
  
    isInLibrary
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
  
        id
        isOrigin
      }
    }
  ",
  "variables": {}
};
var option = {"method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(body) }; "https://read.douban.com/j/search_v2," + JSON.stringify(option) </js>
